mapper.insert: INSERT INTO municipality (`id_municipality`, `id_city`, `municipality`, `lon`, `lat`, `status`, `tx_id`, `tx_date`, `tx_host`, `tx_update`) SELECT null, #{idCity}, #{municipality}, #{lon}, #{lat}, 1, #{transaction.txId}, #{transaction.txDate}, #{transaction.txHost},#{transaction.txUpdate} WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT municipality FROM municipality WHERE municipality = #{municipality})
mapper.select: SELECT id_municipality idLocation, municipality locationName, lon longitude, lat latitude FROM municipality WHERE municipality.status=1 and municipality.id_city=#{cityId}
SELECT municipality FROM municipality WHERE municipality.status=1 AND id_municipality = #{municipalityId}

SELECT a.municipality as nameLocationCovid, b.date as dateLocationCovid, b.death_cases as deathCases, b.confirmed_cases as confirmedCases, b.vaccinated as vaccinated, b.cumulative_cases as cumulativeCases, b.recuperated as recuperated
FROM municipality a, covid_data b, municipality_covid_data d
WHERE b.date <= #{dateCovid} and a.id_municipality = d.id_municipality and d.id_municipality = #{muniId} and b.id_covid_data = d.id_covid_data and b.status = 1

SELECT a.municipality as nameLocationCovid, MAX(b.date) as dateLocationCovid, b.death_cases as deathCases, b.confirmed_cases as confirmedCases, b.vaccinated as vaccinated, b.cumulative_cases as cumulativeCases, b.recuperated as recuperated
FROM municipality a, covid_data b, municipality_covid_data d
WHERE a.id_municipality = #{municipalityId} and b.date <= #{dateCovid} and a.id_municipality = d.id_municipality and b.id_covid_data = d.id_covid_data and b.status = 1

SELECT a.municipality as nameLocationCovid, MAX(b.date) as dateLocationCovid, MAX(b.death_cases) as deathCases, MAX(b.confirmed_cases) as confirmedCases, MAX(b.vaccinated) as vaccinated, MAX(b.cumulative_cases) as cumulativeCases, MAX(b.recuperated) as recuperated
FROM municipality a, covid_data b, municipality_covid_data d
WHERE b.date <= #{dateCovid} and a.id_municipality = d.id_municipality and b.id_covid_data = d.id_covid_data and b.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id_municipality
